      • getAddon

        public static LoadedAddon getAddon(java.io.File file)
                            throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                   java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                   java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                   java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                   java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                   java.lang.SecurityException,
                                   java.io.IOException,
                                   InvalidAddonDescriptionException,
                                   AddonLoadingException
        Parameters:
        file - is the addon jar file
        Returns:
        the generated LoadedAddon
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the main class was not found
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the main class of the addon declares theunderlying constructor represents an abstract class.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the addon's Constructor objectis enforcing Java language access control and the underlyingconstructor is inaccessible.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the jar file's URL is not absolute
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the addon's Constructor throws an exception
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the main class was not found
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the file cannot be accessed or if something went wrong with Constructor.newInstance(Object...)
        java.io.IOException - if something went wrong with the reading of the file
        InvalidAddonDescriptionException - if the addon.json file is not present or malformed or cannot be loaded.
        AddonLoadingException - if there was an error during the loading of the addon.

      • getDescription

        private static AddonDescription getDescription(java.io.File file)
                                        throws InvalidAddonDescriptionException,
                                               AddonLoadingException
        Parameters:
        file - is (hopefully) the addon jar file
        Returns:
        the generated AddonDescription
        Throws:
        InvalidAddonDescriptionException - if the addon.json file is not found or malformed or cannot be loaded.
        AddonLoadingException
